['11 July 2019', 'ARGX-113-1704', 'ARGX-113', 'Protocol Version 3.0, Final', '1.', 'INTRODUCTION', '1.1.', 'Background Information', 'Myasthenia gravis (MG) is an autoimmune disorder characterized in most cases by T-cell', 'and antibody responses to neuromuscular junction proteins such as skeletal muscle nicotinic', 'acetylcholine receptor (AChR).
